entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
